languages.text: "Зачем твоему брату кровь арбитра на руках?"

traits.locale_text: "Зачем твоему брату кровь судьи на руках?"

languages.text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"
languages.original_text: "Зачем твоему брату кровь арбитра на руках?"

traits.locale_text: "Why would your brother want an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"
"Why would your brother want an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"
"What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"
"What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"
"What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"
"What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

languages.text: 「君の兄は、なぜわざわざ自分の手をアービトレイターの血で汚そうとするんだ？」
languages.original_text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

traits.locale_text: 「君の兄は、なぜわざわざ自分の手をアービトレイターの血で汚そうとするんだ？」

languages.text: "Kardeşin ne sebeple bir Yargıcı'nın kanını akıtmak istiyor olabilir?"
languages.original_text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşin ne sebeple bir Yargıcı'nın kanını akıtmak istiyor olabilir?"

languages.text: «¿Qué motivo podría tener tu hermano para querer la sangre de un Arbitrator en sus manos?».
languages.original_text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué motivo podría tener tu hermano para querer la sangre de un Arbitrator en sus manos?».

languages.text: “在你看来，你哥哥为什么打算杀害法务官？”
languages.original_text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

traits.locale_text: “在你看来，你哥哥为什么打算杀害法务官？”

languages.text: « Pour quelle raison votre frère aurait-il pu vouloir se salir les mains avec le sang d'un arbitrator ? »
languages.original_text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour quelle raison votre frère aurait-il pu vouloir se salir les mains avec le sang d'un arbitrator ? »

languages.text: "Welchen Grund sollte Euer Bruder haben, sich mit dem Blut eines Arbitrators die Hände schmutzig zu machen?"
languages.original_text: "What reason could your brother have to want to get an Arbitrator's blood on his hands?"

traits.locale_text: "Welchen Grund sollte Euer Bruder haben, sich mit dem Blut eines Arbitrators die Hände schmutzig zu machen?"
